name: Awake (itch) (Sparky9d)
description:
Controls - Z/C to jump, X/V to dash, arrow keys to move

A mod of Celeste Classic on the shorter side featuring new mechanics, new themes and areas, new music, and with some lore woven in as well.

Huge thank-you to gonengazit, taco360, Michael, and Lord SNEK for help with code, game design decisions, and playtesting feedback. Thanks to Rubyred for making 2 absolutely amazing music tracks.

V1.1 changelog - 

Fixed a crash concerning the retry menu button, fixed various bugs, and changed an area entrance.
